pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Tests for Two Population Mean Vectors // Tests for two high-dimensional population mean vectors. The user has the option to compute the asymptotic, the permutation or the bootstrap based p-value of the test. Some references are: Chen S.X. and Qin Y.L. (2010). doi:10.1214/09-AOS716, Cai T.T., Liu W., and Xia Y. (2014) doi:10.1111/rssb.12034 and Yu X., Li D., Xue L. and Li, R. (2023) doi:10.1080/01621459.2022.2061354.
